    dgamevfs.stream


    struct VFSStream;

    Provides a std.stream.Stream interface to VFSFileInput and VFSFileOutput wrapped in an RAII struct.

    Reference to the Stream itself can be accessed through the stream property.

    Note that the std.stream module in Phobos will be rewritten, which will almost certainly result in API breaking changes in VFSStream. Current implementation of VFSStream is hacked to fit the current std.stream and doesn't always work correctly - in particular, formatted reading crashes - and it's not certain if the cause is in std.stream or VFSStream. This should be resolved once std.stream is rewritten.

    VFSStream stores a single reference to the VFSFileInput/VFSFileOutput it wraps, so it won't be closed until the VFSStream is destroyed. The user must take care not to use any Stream references provided by the stream property after the VFSStream is destroyed.

    this(VFSFileInput input, ulong bytes);

    Construct an input VFSStream.

    Note that a VFSStream constructed for input can only be read from, not written to.

    Parameters:
    VFSFileInput input VFSFileInput to read from the file.
    ulong bytes File size in bytes.
    this(VFSFileOutput output);

    Construct an output VFSStream.

    Note that a VFSStream constructed for output can only be written to, not read from.

    Warning:
    Only writing mode is supported - passing a VFSFileOutput opened for appending can result in undefined behavior. This might change once the Phobos std.stream API is rewritten.

    Parameters:
    VFSFileOutput output VFSFileOutput to write to the file.
    @property Stream stream();

    Access the std.stream.Stream object.
